fallingupwards

For all you Democrats out there: who do you want to win the Democratic nomination to run against Bush in 2004. I'm kind of undecided between John Kerry and Howard Dean. I need to look a little deeper into both candidates before I decide who I think is best for the nomination.
 
 For the Republicans here (that means you Broker :) ): as a Republican, which Democratic candidate would you rather have run against Bush?
